column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////I'd like to take this opportunity to sincerely apologize to myself for not coming here sooner. I pledge to never deprive myself of JINYA ever again. In fact
column2: all the political protestors in the world should take a break and realize there are more important issues in society than confederate statues
column4: and gender equality. They need to focus their efforts on REAL awareness. JINYA awareness. Let's get back to the Ramen. Let's get back to the noodles.
